title: #268 - Tom Segura, Ari Shaffir, & ME
description:
Tom Segura, Ari Shaffir, and I sit down in Atlanta at Ari's Air Bnb to talk about the game, Ari smuggling weed, and Dave Chappelle.

For all of Ari Shaffir's Tour dates go to www.arishaffir.com/tour 

Tom Segura's brand new special "Disgraceful" comes to netflix January 12th go to www.netflix.com/title/80187307 for a preview. 

 

This episode is brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Beach Body. For your free 30 day trial membership text Bert to 303030 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com  
To Follow me on..

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en
